body_html:
i get segfault on backward() when using cpu (pytorch updated yesterday on pip3), python version 3.6.1, osx. cant run gdb on sierra though.
actually it looks fine for 3 first batches then crashes. i only replaced last layer in vgg16 with new 4092,2 linear.

body:
i get segfault on backward() when using cpu (pytorch updated yesterday on pip3), python version 3.6.1, osx. cant run gdb on sierra though.
actually it looks fine for 3 first batches then crashes. i only replaced last layer in vgg16 with new 4092,2 linear.
